 3645:          %% Terminations
 3646:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
 3647:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 3648:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 3649:                            ok
 3650:                    end},
 3651:          #{desc => "await client termination",
 3652:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = State) ->
 3653:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 3654:                                ok ->
 3655:                                    State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
 3656:                                    {ok, State1};
 3657:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3658:                                    ERROR
 3659:                            end
 3660:                    end},
 3661:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 3662:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 3663:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 3664:                            ok
 3665:                    end},
 3666:          #{desc => "await server termination",
 3667:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 3668:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 3669:                                ok ->
 3670:                                    State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 3671:                                    {ok, State1};
 3672:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3673:                                    ERROR
 3674:                            end
 3675:                    end},
 3676: 
 3677: 
 3678:          %% *** We are done ***
 3679:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 3680:         ],
 3681: 
 3682:     i("start server evaluator"),
 3683:     ServerInitState = InitState,
 3684:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, ServerInitState),
 3685: 
 3686:     i("start client evaluator(s)"),
 3687:     ClientInitState = InitState#{host => local_host()},
 3688:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, ClientInitState),
 3689: 
 3690:     i("start 'tester' evaluator"),
 3691:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
 3692:                         client => Client#ev.pid},
 3693:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 3694: 
 3695:     i("await evaluator"),
 3696:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
 3697:     
 3698: 
 3699: 
 3700: traffic_snr_tcp_client_start(Node) ->
 3701:     Self = self(),
 3702:     Fun  = fun() -> traffic_snr_tcp_client(Self) end,
 3703:     erlang:spawn(Node, Fun).
 3704: 
 3705: traffic_snr_tcp_client(Parent) ->
 3706:     {Sock, ServerSA, Path} = traffic_snr_tcp_client_init(Parent),
 3707:     traffic_snr_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, init),
 3708:     traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_continue(Parent, connect),
 3709:     traffic_snr_tcp_client_connect(Sock, ServerSA),
 3710:     traffic_snr_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, connect),
 3711:     traffic_snr_tcp_client_send_loop(Parent, Sock),
 3712:     Reason = traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_terminate(Parent),
 3713:     traffic_snr_tcp_client_close(Sock, Path),
 3714:     exit(Reason).
 3715: 
 3716: 
 3717: traffic_snr_tcp_client_send_loop(Parent, Sock) ->
 3718:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Parent, parent, send) of
 3719:         {ok, stop} -> % Breaks the loop
 3720:             ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, send, ok),
 3721:             ok;
 3722:         {ok, Data} ->
 3723:             case socket:send(Sock, Data) of
 3724:                 ok ->
 3725:                     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, send, ok),
 3726:                     traffic_snr_tcp_client_send_loop(Parent, Sock);
 3727:                 {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 3728:                     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, send, ERROR),
 3729:                     exit({send, Reason})
 3730:             end;
 3731:         {error, Reason} ->
 3732:             exit({await_continue, Reason})
 3733:     end.
 3734: 
 3735: traffic_snr_tcp_client_init(Parent) ->
 3736:     put(sname, "rclient"),
 3737:     ?SEV_IPRINT("init"),
 3738:     _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Parent),
 3739:     {ServerSA, Proto} = traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_start(Parent),
 3740:     Domain   = maps:get(family, ServerSA),
 3741:     Sock     = traffic_snr_tcp_client_create(Domain, Proto),
 3742:     Path     = traffic_snr_tcp_client_bind(Sock, Domain),
 3743:     {Sock, ServerSA, Path}.
 3744: 
 3745: traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_start(Parent) ->
 3746:     i("traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_start -> entry"),
 3747:     ?SEV_AWAIT_START(Parent).
 3748: 
 3749: traffic_snr_tcp_client_create(Domain, Proto) ->
 3750:     i("traffic_snr_tcp_client_create -> entry"),
 3751:     case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
 3752:         {ok, Sock} ->
 3753:             Sock;
 3754:         {error, Reason} ->
 3755:             exit({open_failed, Reason})
 3756:     end.
 3757: 
 3758: traffic_snr_tcp_client_bind(Sock, Domain) ->
 3759:     i("traffic_snr_tcp_client_bind -> entry"),
 3760:     LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 3761:     case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
 3762:         ok ->
 3763:             case socket:sockname(Sock) of
 3764:                 {ok, #{family := local, path := Path}} ->
 3765:                     Path;
 3766:                 {ok, _} ->
 3767:                     undefined;
 3768:                 {error, Reason1} ->
 3769:                     exit({sockname, Reason1})
 3770:             end;
 3771:         {error, Reason} ->
 3772:             exit({bind, Reason})
 3773:     end.
 3774: 
 3775: traffic_snr_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan) ->
 3776:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan).
 3777: 
 3778: traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_continue(Parent, Slogan) ->
 3779:     i("traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_continue -> entry"),
 3780:     ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Parent, parent, Slogan).
 3781: 
 3782: traffic_snr_tcp_client_connect(Sock, ServerSA) ->
 3783:     i("traffic_snr_tcp_client_connect -> entry"),
 3784:     case socket:connect(Sock, ServerSA) of
 3785:         ok ->
 3786:             ok;
 3787:         {error, Reason} ->
 3788:             exit({connect, Reason})
 3789:     end.
 3790: 
 3791: traffic_snr_tcp_client_close(Sock, Path) ->
 3792:     i("traffic_snr_tcp_client_close -> entry"),
 3793:     case socket:close(Sock) of
 3794:         ok ->
 3795:             unlink_path(Path),
 3796:             ok;
 3797:         {error, Reason} ->
 3798:             ?SEV_EPRINT("failed closing: "
 3799:                         "~n   Reason: ~p", [Reason]),
 3800:             unlink_path(Path),
 3801:             {error, {close, Reason}}
 3802:     end.
 3803: 
 3804: traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_terminate(Parent) ->
 3805:     i("traffic_snr_tcp_client_await_terminate -> entry"),
 3806:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Parent, parent) of
 3807:         ok ->
 3808:             ok;
 3809:         {error, Reason} ->
 3810:             Reason
 3811:     end.
 3812: 
 3813:

 3817: %% by repeatedly sending a meassage between two entities.
 3818: %% The same basic test case is used for three different message sizes; 
 3819: %% small (8 bytes), medium (8K) and large (8M).
 3820: %% The message is sent from A to B and then back again. This is 
 3821: %% repeated a set number of times (more times the small the message).
 3822: %% This is the 'small' message test case,
 3823: %% for TCP and IPv4.
 3824:

 3826:     ?TT(?SECS(15)),

 3828:     Num = ?TPP_NUM(Config, ?TPP_SMALL_NUM),
 3829:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 3830:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 3831:            fun() ->
 3832:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
 3833:                                  proto  => tcp,
 3834:                                  msg    => Msg,
 3835:                                  num    => Num},
 3836:                    ok = traffic_ping_pong_send_and_recv_stream(InitState)
 3837:            end).

 4185:                    has_support_sctp(),
 4186:                    is_old_fedora16(),
 4187:                    is_slow_ubuntu(Config),
 4188:                    traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond()
 4189:            end,
 4190:            fun() ->
 4191:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
 4192:                                  proto  => sctp,
 4193:                                  msg    => Msg,
 4194:                                  num    => Num},
 4195:                    ok = traffic_ping_pong_send_and_recv_stream(InitState)
 4196:            end).

 4200: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4201: %% This test case is intended to test that the send and recv functions
 4202: %% by repeatedly sending a meassage between two entities.
 4203: %% The same basic test case is used for three different message sizes; 
 4204: %% small (8 bytes), medium (8K) and large (8M).
 4205: %% The message is sent from A to B and then back again. This is 
 4206: %% repeated a set number of times (more times the small the message).
 4207: %% This is the 'large' message test case,
 4208: %% for SCTP and IPv6.
 4209: 
 4210: traffic_ping_pong_large_send_and_recv_sctp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4211:     ?TT(?SECS(60)),
 4212:     Msg = l2b(?TPP_LARGE),
 4213:     Num = ?TPP_NUM(Config, ?TPP_LARGE_NUM),
 4214:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 4215:            fun() ->
 4216:                    has_support_ipv6(),
 4217:                    has_support_sctp(),
 4218:                    is_old_fedora16(),
 4219:                    is_slow_ubuntu(Config)
 4220:            end,
 4221:            fun() ->
 4222:                    InitState = #{domain => inet6,
 4223:                                  proto  => sctp,
 4224:                                  msg    => Msg,
 4225:                                  num    => Num},
 4226:                    ok = traffic_ping_pong_send_and_recv_stream(InitState)
 4227:            end).

 4230: 
 4231: %% This test case is a bit extreme and fails on some hosts
 4232: %% (e.g. OpenIndiana Hipster), so exclude them.
 4233: traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond() ->
 4234:     traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond(os:type(), os:version()).
 4235: 
 4236: traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond({unix, sunos}, _) ->
 4237:     skip("TC does not work on platform");
 4238: traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond({unix, linux}, _) ->
 4239:     traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond2(string:trim(os:cmd("cat /etc/issue")));
 4240: traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond(_, _) ->
 4241:     ok.
 4242: 
 4243: traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond2("Welcome to SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP1 (i586)" ++ _) ->
 4244:     skip("TC does not work on platform");
 4245: traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond2("Fedora release 16 " ++ _) ->
 4246:     skip("Very slow VM");
 4247: traffic_ping_pong_large_host_cond2(_) ->
 4248:     ok.

 4708:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 4709:            fun() ->
 4710:                    is_not_windows(),
 4711:                    has_support_ipv4(),
 4712:                    traffic_ping_pong_large_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_cond()
 4713:            end,
 4714:            fun() ->
 4715:                    ?TT(?SECS(60)),
 4716:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
 4717:                                  proto  => tcp,
 4718:                                  msg    => Msg,
 4719:                                  num    => Num},
 4720:                    ok = traffic_ping_pong_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_stream(InitState)
 4721:            end).

 4725:     traffic_ping_pong_large_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_cond(os:type(), os:version()).
 4726:

 4728:   when (M < 3) ->
 4729:     skip("TC may not work on this version");
 4730: traffic_ping_pong_large_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_cond(_, _) ->
 4731:     ok.

 5006: 
 5007: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 5008: 
 5009: %% Ping-Pong for TCP
 5010: 
 5011: traffic_ping_pong_send_and_recv_stream(InitState) ->
 5012:     Send = fun(Sock, Data) -> socket:send(Sock, Data) end,
 5013:     Recv = fun(Sock, Sz)   -> socket:recv(Sock, Sz) end,
 5014:     InitState2 = InitState#{send => Send, % Send function
 5015:                             recv => Recv  % Receive function
 5016:                            },
 5017:     traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_stream(InitState2).
 5018: 
 5019: traffic_ping_pong_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_stream(#{domain := local} = InitState) ->
 5020:     Recv = fun(Sock, Sz)   -> 
 5021:                    case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Sz, 0) of
 5022:                        %% On some platforms, the address
 5023:                        %% *is* provided (e.g. linux)
 5024:                        {ok, #{addr  := #{family := local},
 5025:                               iov   := [Data]}} ->
 5026:                            {ok, Data};
 5027:                        {ok, #{addr := _} = Msg} ->
 5028:                            {error, {msg, Msg}};
 5029:                        %% On some platforms, the address
 5030:                        %% is *not* provided (e.g. FreeBSD)
 5031:                        {ok, #{iov   := [Data]}} ->
 5032:                            {ok, Data};
 5033:                        {ok, Msg} ->
 5034:                            {error, {msg, Msg}};
 5035:                        {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5036:                            ERROR
 5037:                    end
 5038:            end,
 5039:     InitState2 = InitState#{recv => Recv},  % Receive function
 5040:     traffic_ping_pong_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_stream2(InitState2);
 5041: traffic_ping_pong_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_stream(InitState) ->
 5042:     Recv = fun(Sock, Sz)   -> 
 5043:                    case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Sz, 0) of
 5044:                        {ok, #{iov   := [Data]}} ->
 5045:                            {ok, Data};
 5046:                        {ok, Msg} ->
 5047:                            {error, {msg, Msg}};
 5048:                        {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5049:                            ERROR
 5050:                    end
 5051:            end,
 5052:     InitState2 = InitState#{recv => Recv},  % Receive function
 5053:     traffic_ping_pong_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_stream2(InitState2).
 5054: 
 5055: traffic_ping_pong_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_stream2(InitState) ->
 5056:     Send = fun(Sock, Data) when is_binary(Data) ->
 5057:                    Msg = #{iov => [Data]},
 5058:                    socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg);
 5059:               (Sock, Data) when is_list(Data) -> %% We assume iovec...
 5060:                    Msg = #{iov => Data},
 5061:                    socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 5062:            end,
 5063:     InitState2 = InitState#{send => Send}, % Send function
 5064:     traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_stream(InitState2).
 5065: 
 5066: 
 5067: traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_stream(#{msg := Msg} = InitState) ->
 5068:     Fun = fun(Sock) -> 
 5069:                   {ok, RcvSz} = socket:getopt(Sock, socket, rcvbuf),
 5070: 		  ?SEV_IPRINT("RcvBuf is ~p (needs at least ~p)", 
 5071: 			      [RcvSz, 16+size(Msg)]),
 5072:                   if (RcvSz < size(Msg)) ->
 5073:                           NewRcvSz = 1024+size(Msg),
 5074:                           case socket:setopt(Sock, socket, rcvbuf, NewRcvSz) of
 5075: 			      ok ->
 5076: 				  ok;
 5077: 			      {error, enobufs} ->
 5078: 				  skip(?F("Change ~w buffer size (to ~w) "
 5079:                                           "not allowed", 
 5080:                                           [rcvbuf, NewRcvSz]));
 5081: 			      {error, Reason1} ->
 5082: 				  ?FAIL({rcvbuf, Reason1})
 5083: 			  end;
 5084:                      true ->
 5085:                           ok
 5086:                   end,
 5087:                   {ok, SndSz} = socket:getopt(Sock, socket, sndbuf),
 5088: 		  ?SEV_IPRINT("SndBuf is ~p (needs at least ~p)", 
 5089: 			      [SndSz, 16+size(Msg)]),
 5090:                   if (SndSz < size(Msg)) ->
 5091:                           NewSndSz = 1024+size(Msg),
 5092:                           case socket:setopt(Sock, socket, sndbuf, NewSndSz) of
 5093: 			      ok ->
 5094: 				  ok;
 5095: 			      {error, enobufs} ->
 5096: 				  skip(?F("Change ~w buffer size (to ~w) "
 5097:                                           "not allowed", 
 5098:                                           [sndbuf, NewSndSz]));
 5099: 			      {error, Reason2} ->
 5100: 				  ?FAIL({sndbuf, Reason2})
 5101: 			  end;
 5102:                      true ->
 5103:                           ok
 5104:                   end,
 5105:                   case os:type() of
 5106:                       {win32, nt} ->
 5107:                           ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, rcvbuf, 12*1024);
 5108:                       _ ->
 5109:                           ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, rcvbuf, {12, 1024})
 5110:                   end
 5111:           end,
 5112:     traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_stream2(InitState#{buf_init => Fun}).
 5113: 
 5114: traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_stream2(InitState) ->
 5115:     ServerSeq =
 5116:         [
 5117:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 5118:          #{desc => "await start",
 5119:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 5120:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 5121:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 5122:                    end},
 5123:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 5124:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 5125:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 5126:                            ok
 5127:                    end},
 5128: 
 5129:          %% *** Init part ***
 5130:          #{desc => "which local address",
 5131:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 5132:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 5133:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
 5134:                    end},
 5135:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
 5136:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, proto := Proto} = State) ->
 5137:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
 5138:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 5139:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
 5140:                                {error, eprotonosupport = Reason} ->
 5141:                                    {skip, Reason};
 5142:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5143:                                    ERROR
 5144:                            end
 5145:                    end},
 5146:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 5147:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 5148:                          lsock  := LSock,
 5149:                          lsa    := LSA} = _State) ->
 5150:                            case socket:bind(LSock, LSA) of
 5151:                                ok ->
 5152:                                    ok; % We do not care about the port for local
 5153:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5154:                                    ERROR
 5155:                            end;
 5156:                       (#{lsock := LSock, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
 5157:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
 5158:                                ok ->
 5159:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
 5160:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound to port: ~w", [Port]),
 5161:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
 5162:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5163:                                    ERROR
 5164:                            end
 5165:                    end},
 5166:          #{desc => "maybe init buffers",
 5167:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, buf_init := BufInit} = _State) ->
 5168:                            BufInit(LSock)
 5169:                    end},
 5170:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
 5171:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
 5172:                            socket:listen(LSock)
 5173:                    end},
 5174:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 5175:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 5176:                          tester := Tester, local_sa := LSA}) ->
 5177:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, LSA),
 5178:                            ok;
 5179:                       (#{tester := Tester, local_sa := LSA, lport := Port}) ->
 5180:                            ServerSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 5181:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, ServerSA),
 5182:                            ok
 5183:                    end},
 5184: 
 5185:          %% The actual test
 5186:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
 5187:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 5188:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
 5189:                    end},
 5190:          #{desc => "accept",
 5191:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 5192:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
 5193:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 5194:                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
 5195:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5196:                                    ERROR
 5197:                            end
 5198:                    end},
 5199:          #{desc => "create handler",
 5200:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 5201:                            Handler = tpp_tcp_handler_create(),
 5202:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("handler created: ~p", [Handler]),
 5203:                            {ok, State#{handler => Handler}}
 5204:                    end},
 5205:          #{desc => "monitor handler",
 5206:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler} = _State) ->
 5207:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Handler),
 5208:                            ok
 5209:                    end},
 5210:          #{desc => "transfer connection socket ownership to handler",
 5211:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler, csock := Sock} = _State) ->
 5212:                            socket:setopt(Sock, otp, controlling_process, Handler)
 5213:                    end},
 5214:          #{desc => "start handler",
 5215:            cmd  => fun(#{handler  := Handler,
 5216:                          csock    := Sock,
 5217:                          send     := Send,
 5218:                          recv     := Recv} = _State) ->
 5219:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Handler, {Sock, Send, Recv}),
 5220:                            ok
 5221:                    end},
 5222:          #{desc => "await handler ready (init)",
 5223:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 5224:                          handler := Handler} = State) ->
 5225:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Handler, handler, init, 
 5226:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
 5227:                                ok ->
 5228:                                    {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)};
 5229:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5230:                                    ERROR
 5231:                            end
 5232:                    end},
 5233:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
 5234:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5235:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
 5236:                            ok
 5237:                    end},
 5238:          #{desc => "await continue (recv)",
 5239:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 5240:                          handler := Handler} = _State) ->
 5241:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv, 
 5242:                                                [{handler, Handler}])
 5243:                    end},
 5244:          #{desc => "order handler to recv",
 5245:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler} = _State) ->
 5246:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Handler, recv),
 5247:                            ok
 5248:                    end},
 5249:          #{desc => "await handler ready (recv)",
 5250:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 5251:                          handler := Handler} = State) ->
 5252:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Handler, handler, recv, 
 5253:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
 5254:                                {ok, Result} ->
 5255:                                    %% ?SEV_IPRINT("Result: ~p", [Result]),
 5256:                                    {ok, State#{result => Result}};
 5257:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5258:                                    ERROR
 5259:                            end
 5260:                    end},
 5261:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv)",
 5262:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, 
 5263:                          result := Result} = State) ->
 5264:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv, Result),
 5265:                            {ok, maps:remove(result, State)}
 5266:                    end},
 5267: 
 5268:          %% Termination
 5269:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 5270:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 5271:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 5272:                                ok ->
 5273:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 5274:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5275:                                    ERROR
 5276:                            end
 5277:                    end},
 5278:          #{desc => "stop handler",
 5279:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler}) ->
 5280:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Handler),
 5281:                            ok
 5282:                    end},
 5283:          #{desc => "await handler termination",
 5284:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler} = State) ->
 5285:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Handler),
 5286:                            State1 = maps:remove(handler, State),
 5287:                            {ok, State1}
 5288:                    end},
 5289:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
 5290:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 5291:                          lsock    := Sock,
 5292:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 5293:                            (catch socket:close(Sock)),
 5294:                            State1 =
 5295:                                unlink_path(Path,
 5296:                                            fun() -> 
 5297:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
 5298:                                            end,
 5299:                                            fun() -> State end),
 5300:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State1)};
 5301:                       (#{lsock := Sock} = State) ->
 5302:                            (catch socket:close(Sock)),
 5303:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)}
 5304:                    end},
 5305: 
 5306:          %% *** We are done ***
 5307:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 5308:         ],
 5309: 
 5310:     ClientSeq =
 5311:         [
 5312:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 5313:          #{desc => "await start",
 5314:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 5315:                            {Tester, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 5316:                            {ok, State#{tester    => Tester, 
 5317:                                        server_sa => ServerSA}}
 5318:                    end},
 5319:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 5320:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 5321:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 5322:                            ok
 5323:                    end},
 5324: 
 5325:          %% *** Init part ***
 5326:          #{desc => "create node",
 5327:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 5328:                            {Peer, Node} = start_node("client"),
 5329:                            {ok, State#{peer => Peer, node => Node}}
 5330:                    end},
 5331:          #{desc => "monitor client node",
 5332:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = _State) ->
 5333:                            true = erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
 5334:                            ok
 5335:                    end},
 5336:          #{desc => "create remote client",
 5337:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = State) ->
 5338:                            Pid = tpp_tcp_client_create(Node),
 5339:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("remote client created: ~p", [Pid]),
 5340:                            {ok, State#{rclient => Pid}}
 5341:                    end},
 5342:          #{desc => "monitor remote client",
 5343:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient := Pid}) ->
 5344:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 5345:                            ok
 5346:                    end},
 5347:          #{desc => "order remote client to start",
 5348:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient   := RClient,
 5349:                          proto     := Proto,
 5350:                          server_sa := ServerSA,
 5351:                          buf_init  := BufInit,
 5352:                          send      := Send,
 5353:                          recv      := Recv}) ->
 5354:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(RClient, 
 5355:                                                {ServerSA, Proto, BufInit,
 5356:                                                 Send, Recv}),
 5357:                            ok
 5358:                    end},
 5359:          #{desc => "await remote client ready",
 5360:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 5361:                          rclient := RClient} = _State) ->
 5362:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(RClient, rclient, init, 
 5363:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
 5364:                                ok ->
 5365:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("remote client started"),
 5366:                                    ok;
 5367:                                {error, {unexpected_exit, _, {bind, eaddrnotavail = Reason}}} ->
 5368:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("remote client bind failure:"
 5369:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 5370:                                    {skip, Reason};
 5371:                                {error, no_address = Reason} ->
 5372:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("remote valid address"),
 5373:                                    {skip, Reason};
 5374:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 5375:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("remote client failure:"
 5376:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 5377:                                    ERROR
 5378:                            end
 5379:                    end},
 5380:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 5381:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5382:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 5383:                            ok
 5384:                    end},
 5385: 
 5386:          %% The actual test
 5387:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
 5388:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 5389:                          rclient := RClient} = _State) ->
 5390:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect, 
 5391:                                                [{rclient, RClient}]),
 5392:                            ok
 5393:                    end},
 5394:          #{desc => "order remote client to continue (connect)",
 5395:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient := RClient}) ->
 5396:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(RClient, connect),
 5397:                            ok
 5398:                    end},
 5399:          #{desc => "await remote client ready (connect)",
 5400:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 5401:                          rclient := RClient} = _State) ->
 5402:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(RClient, rclient, connect, 
 5403:                                             [{tester, Tester}])
 5404:                    end},
 5405:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
 5406:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5407:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
 5408:                            ok
 5409:                    end},
 5410:          #{desc => "await continue (send)",
 5411:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 5412:                          rclient := RClient} = _State) ->
 5413:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, 
 5414:                                                send, 
 5415:                                                [{rclient, RClient}])
 5416:                    end},
 5417:          #{desc => "order remote client to continue (send)",
 5418:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient := RClient,
 5419:                          msg     := Msg,
 5420:                          num     := Num} = State) ->
 5421:                            Data = {Msg, Num},
 5422:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(RClient, send, Data),
 5423:                            {ok, maps:remove(data, State)}
 5424:                    end},
 5425:          #{desc => "await remote client ready (send)",
 5426:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 5427:                          rclient := RClient} = State) ->
 5428:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(RClient, rclient, send, 
 5429:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
 5430:                                {ok, Result} ->
 5431:                                    {ok, State#{result => Result}};
 5432:                                {error,
 5433:                                 {unexpected_exit, rclient, noconnection}} ->
 5434:                                    %% One guess is that the message is so
 5435:                                    %% "large" that the client node died on us.
 5436:                                    %% Or so "large" that the connection (to
 5437:                                    %% the node) fails/dies.
 5438:                                    %% Either way, we assume this is not actually
 5439:                                    %% related to what we are testing => skip
 5440:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("lost connection "
 5441:                                                "to remote client node => SKIP"),
 5442:                                    {skip, {rclient, noconnection}};
 5443:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5444:                                    ERROR
 5445:                            end
 5446:                    end},
 5447:          #{desc => "announce ready (send)",
 5448:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, result := Result} = State) ->
 5449:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send, Result),
 5450:                            {ok, maps:remove(result, State)}
 5451:                    end},
 5452: 
 5453:          %% Termination
 5454:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 5455:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester, 
 5456:                          rclient := RClient} = State) ->
 5457:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester,
 5458:                                                      [{rclient, RClient}]) of
 5459:                                ok ->
 5460:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 5461:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5462:                                    ERROR
 5463:                            end
 5464:                    end},
 5465:          #{desc => "stop remote client",
 5466:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient := RClient}) ->
 5467:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(RClient),
 5468:                            ok
 5469:                    end},
 5470:          #{desc => "await remote client termination",
 5471:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient := RClient} = State) ->
 5472:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(RClient),
 5473:                            State1 = maps:remove(rclient, State),
 5474:                            {ok, State1}
 5475:                    end},
 5476:          #{desc => "stop client node",
 5477:            cmd  => fun(#{peer := Peer} = State) ->
 5478:                            {ok,
 5479:                             try peer:stop(Peer) of
 5480:                                 ok ->
 5481:                                     State#{node_stop => ok};
 5482:                                 {error, Reason} ->
 5483:                                     ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected node stop result: "
 5484:                                                 "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 5485:                                     State#{node_stop => error}
 5486:                             catch
 5487:                                 C:E:S ->
 5488:                                     ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected node stop result: "
 5489:                                                 "~n   Class: ~p"
 5490:                                                 "~n   Error: ~p"
 5491:                                                 "~n   Stack: ~p",[C, E, S]),
 5492:                                     State#{node_stop => error}
 5493:                             end}
 5494:                    end},
 5495:          #{desc => "await client node termination",
 5496:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node, node_stop := ok} = State) ->
 5497:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Success node stop - await nodedown"),
 5498:                            receive
 5499:                                {nodedown, Node} ->
 5500:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("nodedown received - cleanup"),
 5501:                                    State1 = maps:remove(node, State),
 5502:                                    {ok, State1}
 5503:                            end;
 5504:                       (#{node_stop := error} = State) ->
 5505:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Failed node stop - cleanup"),
 5506:                            State1 = maps:remove(node, State),
 5507:                            {ok, State1}
 5508:                    end},
 5509: 
 5510:          %% *** We are done ***
 5511:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 5512:         ],
 5513: 
 5514:     TesterSeq =
 5515:         [
 5516:          %% *** Init part ***
 5517:          #{desc => "monitor server",
 5518:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 5519:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 5520:                            ok
 5521:                    end},
 5522:          #{desc => "monitor client",
 5523:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 5524:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 5525:                            ok
 5526:                    end},
 5527: 
 5528:          %% Start the server
 5529:          #{desc => "order server start",
 5530:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 5531:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 5532:                            ok
 5533:                    end},
 5534:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
 5535:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 5536:                            {ok, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
 5537:                            {ok, State#{server_sa => ServerSA}}
 5538:                    end},
 5539: 
 5540:          %% Start the client
 5541:          #{desc => "order client start",
 5542:            cmd  => fun(#{client    := Pid, 
 5543:                          server_sa := ServerSA} = _State) ->
 5544:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, ServerSA),
 5545:                            ok
 5546:                    end},
 5547:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
 5548:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 5549:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
 5550:                    end},
 5551:  
 5552:          %% The actual test
 5553:          #{desc => "order server continue (accept)",
 5554:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 5555:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, accept),
 5556:                            ok
 5557:                    end},
 5558:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 5559:          #{desc => "order client continue (connect)",
 5560:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 5561:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, connect),
 5562:                            ok
 5563:                    end},
 5564:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
 5565:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
 5566:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
 5567:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept,
 5568:                                             [{client, Client}]),
 5569:                            ok
 5570:                    end},
 5571:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
 5572:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
 5573:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
 5574:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect, 
 5575:                                             [{server, Server}])
 5576:                    end},
 5577:          #{desc => "order server continue (recv)",
 5578:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 5579:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
 5580:                            ok
 5581:                    end},
 5582:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 5583:          #{desc => "order client continue (send)",
 5584:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 5585:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, send),
 5586:                            ok
 5587:                    end},
 5588:          #{desc => "await client ready (send)",
 5589:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
 5590:                          client := Client} = State) ->
 5591:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send, 
 5592:                                                  [{server, Server}]) of
 5593:                                {ok, {_, _, _, _, _} = Result} ->
 5594:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("client result: "
 5595:                                                "~n   ~p", [Result]),
 5596:                                    {ok, State#{client_result => Result}};
 5597:                                {ok, BadResult} ->
 5598:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("client result: "
 5599:                                                "~n   ~p", [BadResult]),
 5600:                                    {error, {invalid_client_result, BadResult}};
 5601:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5602:                                    ERROR
 5603:                            end
 5604:                    end},
 5605:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv)",
 5606:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
 5607:                          client := Client,
 5608:                          num    := Num} = State) ->
 5609:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv,
 5610:                                                  [{client, Client}]) of
 5611:                                {ok, {Num, _, _, _, _} = Result} ->
 5612:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("server result: "
 5613:                                                "~n   ~p", [Result]),
 5614:                                    Result2 = erlang:delete_element(1, Result),
 5615:                                    {ok, State#{server_result => Result2}};
 5616:                                {ok, BadResult} ->
 5617:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("bad server result: "
 5618:                                                "~n   ~p", [BadResult]),
 5619:                                    {error, {invalid_server_result, BadResult}};
 5620:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5621:                                    ERROR
 5622:                            end
 5623:                    end},
 5624:          #{desc => "present result",
 5625:            cmd  => fun(#{server_result := SRes,
 5626:                          client_result := CRes,
 5627:                          num           := Num} = State) ->
 5628:                            {SSent, SReceived, SStart, SStop} = SRes,
 5629:                            {CSent, CReceived, _, CStart, CStop} = CRes,
 5630:                            STime = tdiff(SStart, SStop),
 5631:                            CTime = tdiff(CStart, CStop),
 5632:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("process result data:"
 5633:                                        "~n   Num:          ~p"
 5634:                                        "~n   Server Sent:  ~p"
 5635:                                        "~n   Server Recv:  ~p"
 5636:                                        "~n   Server Start: ~p"
 5637:                                        "~n   Server Stop:  ~p"
 5638:                                        "~n   Server Time:  ~p"
 5639:                                        "~n   Client Sent:  ~p"
 5640:                                        "~n   Client Recv:  ~p"
 5641:                                        "~n   Client Start: ~p"
 5642:                                        "~n   Client Stop:  ~p"
 5643:                                        "~n   Client Time:  ~p",
 5644:                                        [Num,
 5645:                                         SSent, SReceived, SStart, SStop,
 5646:                                         STime,
 5647:                                         CSent, CReceived, CStart, CStop,
 5648:                                         CTime]),
 5649:                            if
 5650:                                (STime =:= 0) orelse
 5651:                                (CTime =:= 0) ->
 5652:                                    {skip,
 5653:                                     ?F("Invalid exec time(s): ~w , ~w",
 5654:                                        [STime, CTime])};
 5655:                                true ->
 5656:                                    %% Note that the sizes we are counting is 
 5657:                                    %% only the "data" part of the messages.
 5658:                                    %% There is also fixed header for each
 5659:                                    %% message, which of course is small for
 5660:                                    %% the large messages, but comparatively
 5661:                                    %% big for the small messages!
 5662:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT(
 5663:                                       "Results: ~w messages exchanged"
 5664:                                       "~n   Server: ~w msec"
 5665:                                       "~n      ~.2f msec/message (roundtrip)"
 5666:                                       "~n      ~.2f messages/msec (roundtrip)"
 5667:                                       "~n      ~w bytes/msec sent"
 5668:                                       "~n      ~w bytes/msec received"
 5669:                                       "~n   Client: ~w msec"
 5670:                                       "~n      ~.2f msec/message (roundtrip)"
 5671:                                       "~n      ~.2f messages/msec (roundtrip)"
 5672:                                       "~n      ~w bytes/msec sent"
 5673:                                       "~n      ~w bytes/msec received",
 5674:                                       [Num,
 5675:                                        STime,
 5676:                                        STime / Num,
 5677:                                        Num / STime,
 5678:                                        SSent div STime,
 5679:                                        SReceived div STime,
 5680:                                        CTime,
 5681:                                        CTime / Num,
 5682:                                        Num / CTime,
 5683:                                        CSent div CTime,
 5684:                                        CReceived div CTime]),
 5685:                                    State1 = maps:remove(server_result, State),
 5686:                                    State2 = maps:remove(client_result, State1),
 5687:                                    {ok, State2}
 5688:                            end
 5689:                    end},
 5690: 
 5691:          %% Terminations
 5692:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
 5693:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 5694:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 5695:                            ok
 5696:                    end},
 5697:          #{desc => "await client termination",
 5698:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = State) ->
 5699:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 5700:                                ok ->
 5701:                                    State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
 5702:                                    {ok, State1};
 5703:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5704:                                    ERROR
 5705:                            end
 5706:                    end},
 5707:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 5708:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 5709:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 5710:                            ok
 5711:                    end},
 5712:          #{desc => "await server termination",
 5713:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 5714:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 5715:                                ok ->
 5716:                                    State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 5717:                                    {ok, State1};
 5718:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5719:                                    ERROR
 5720:                            end
 5721:                    end},
 5722: 
 5723: 
 5724:          %% *** We are done ***
 5725:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 5726:         ],
 5727: 
 5728:     i("start server evaluator"),
 5729:     ServerInitState = #{domain   => maps:get(domain,   InitState),
 5730:                         proto    => maps:get(proto,    InitState),
 5731:                         recv     => maps:get(recv,     InitState),
 5732:                         send     => maps:get(send,     InitState),
 5733:                         buf_init => maps:get(buf_init, InitState)},
 5734:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, ServerInitState),
 5735: 
 5736:     i("start client evaluator(s)"),
 5737:     ClientInitState = InitState#{host => local_host()},
 5738:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, ClientInitState),
 5739: 
 5740:     i("start 'tester' evaluator"),
 5741:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
 5742:                         client => Client#ev.pid,
 5743:                         num    => maps:get(num, InitState)},
 5744:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 5745: 
 5746:     i("await evaluator"),
 5747:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
 5748:     
 5749: 
 5750: tpp_tcp_handler_create() ->
 5751:     Self = self(),
 5752:     erlang:spawn(fun() -> tpp_tcp_handler(Self) end).
 5753: 
 5754: tpp_tcp_handler(Parent) ->
 5755:     tpp_tcp_handler_init(Parent),
 5756:     {Sock, Send, Recv} = tpp_tcp_handler_await_start(Parent),
 5757:     tpp_tcp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, init),
 5758:     tpp_tcp_handler_await_continue(Parent, recv),
 5759:     Result = tpp_tcp_handler_msg_exchange(Sock, Send, Recv),
 5760:     tpp_tcp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, recv, Result),
 5761:     Reason = tpp_tcp_handler_await_terminate(Parent),
 5762:     ?SEV_IPRINT("terminating"),
 5763:     exit(Reason).
 5764: 
 5765: tpp_tcp_handler_init(Parent) ->
 5766:     put(sname, "handler"),
 5767:     ?SEV_IPRINT("init"),
 5768:     _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Parent),
 5769:     ok.
 5770: 
 5771: tpp_tcp_handler_await_start(Parent) ->
 5772:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await start"),
 5773:     ?SEV_AWAIT_START(Parent).
 5774: 
 5775: tpp_tcp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan) ->
 5776:     ?SEV_IPRINT("announce ready (~p)", [Slogan]),
 5777:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan).
 5778: tpp_tcp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan, Extra) ->
 5779:     ?SEV_IPRINT("announce ready (~p)", [Slogan]),
 5780:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan, Extra).
 5781: 
 5782: tpp_tcp_handler_await_continue(Parent, Slogan) ->
 5783:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await continue (~p)", [Slogan]),
 5784:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Parent, parent, Slogan) of
 5785:         ok ->
 5786:             %% ?SEV_IPRINT("continue (~p): ok", [Slogan]),
 5787:             ok;
 5788:         {error, Reason} ->
 5789:             ?SEV_EPRINT("continue (~p): error"
 5790:                         "~n   ~p", [Slogan, Reason]),
 5791:             exit({continue, Slogan, Reason})
 5792:     end.
 5793: 
 5794: tpp_tcp_handler_await_terminate(Parent) ->
 5795:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await terminate"),
 5796:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Parent, parent) of
 5797:         ok ->
 5798:             ok;
 5799:         {error, Reason} ->
 5800:             Reason
 5801:     end.
 5802: 
 5803: tpp_tcp_handler_msg_exchange(Sock, Send, Recv) ->
 5804:     tpp_tcp_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv, 0, 0, 0, undefined).
 5805: 
 5806: tpp_tcp_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv, N, Sent, Received, Start) ->
 5807:     %% ?SEV_IPRINT("[~w] try receive", [N]),
 5808:     case tpp_tcp_recv_req(Sock, Recv) of
 5809:         {ok, Msg, RecvSz} ->
 5810:             NewStart = if (Start =:= undefined) -> ?SLIB:timestamp(); 
 5811:                           true -> Start end,
 5812:             %% ?SEV_IPRINT("[~w] received - now try send", [N]),
 5813:             case tpp_tcp_send_rep(Sock, Send, Msg) of
 5814:                 {ok, SendSz} ->
 5815:                     tpp_tcp_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv,
 5816:                                                       N+1,
 5817:                                                       Sent+SendSz,
 5818:                                                       Received+RecvSz,
 5819:                                                       NewStart);
 5820:                 {error, SReason} ->
 5821:                     ?SEV_EPRINT("send (~w): ~p", [N, SReason]),
 5822:                     exit({send, SReason, N})
 5823:             end;
 5824:         {error, closed} ->
 5825:             ?SEV_IPRINT("closed - we are done: ~w, ~w, ~w", [N, Sent, Received]),
 5826:             Stop = ?SLIB:timestamp(),
 5827:             {N, Sent, Received, Start, Stop};
 5828:         {error, RReason} ->
 5829:             ?SEV_EPRINT("recv (~w): ~p", [N, RReason]),
 5830:             exit({recv, RReason, N})
 5831:     end.
 5832:             
 5833: %% The (remote) client process
 5834: 
 5835: tpp_tcp_client_create(Node) ->
 5836:     Self = self(),
 5837:     Fun  = fun() -> tpp_tcp_client(Self) end,
 5838:     erlang:spawn(Node, Fun).
 5839: 
 5840: tpp_tcp_client(Parent) ->
 5841:     tpp_tcp_client_init(Parent),
 5842:     {ServerSA, Proto, BufInit, Send, Recv} = tpp_tcp_client_await_start(Parent),
 5843:     Domain   = maps:get(family, ServerSA),
 5844:     Sock     = tpp_tcp_client_sock_open(Domain, Proto, BufInit),
 5845:     Path     = tpp_tcp_client_sock_bind(Sock, Domain),
 5846:     tpp_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, init),
 5847:     tpp_tcp_client_await_continue(Parent, connect),
 5848:     tpp_tcp_client_sock_connect(Sock, ServerSA),
 5849:     tpp_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, connect),
 5850:     {InitMsg, Num} = tpp_tcp_client_await_continue(Parent, send),
 5851:     Result = tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange(Sock, Send, Recv, InitMsg, Num),
 5852:     tpp_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, send, Result),
 5853:     Reason = tpp_tcp_client_await_terminate(Parent),
 5854:     tpp_tcp_client_sock_close(Sock, Path),
 5855:     ?SEV_IPRINT("terminating"),
 5856:     exit(Reason).
 5857: 
 5858: tpp_tcp_client_init(Parent) ->
 5859:     put(sname, "rclient"),
 5860:     ?SEV_IPRINT("init"),
 5861:     _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Parent),
 5862:     ok.
 5863: 
 5864: tpp_tcp_client_await_start(Parent) ->
 5865:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await start"),
 5866:     ?SEV_AWAIT_START(Parent).
 5867: 
 5868: tpp_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan) ->
 5869:     ?SEV_IPRINT("announce ready (~p)", [Slogan]),
 5870:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan).
 5871: tpp_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan, Extra) ->
 5872:     ?SEV_IPRINT("announce ready (~p): ~p", [Slogan, Extra]),
 5873:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan, Extra).
 5874: 
 5875: tpp_tcp_client_await_continue(Parent, Slogan) ->
 5876:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await continue (~p)", [Slogan]),
 5877:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Parent, parent, Slogan) of
 5878:         ok ->
 5879:             ?SEV_IPRINT("continue (~p): ok", [Slogan]),
 5880:             ok;
 5881:         {ok, Data} ->
 5882:             ?SEV_IPRINT("continue (~p): ok with data", [Slogan]),
 5883:             Data;
 5884:         {error, Reason} ->
 5885:             ?SEV_EPRINT("continue (~p): error"
 5886:                         "~n   ~p", [Slogan, Reason]),
 5887:             exit({continue, Slogan, Reason})
 5888:     end.
 5889: 
 5890: tpp_tcp_client_await_terminate(Parent) ->
 5891:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await terminate"),
 5892:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Parent, parent) of
 5893:         ok ->
 5894:             ?SEV_IPRINT("termination received: normal"),
 5895:             normal;
 5896:         {error, Reason} ->
 5897:             ?SEV_IPRINT("termination received: ~w", [Reason]),
 5898:             Reason
 5899:     end.
 5900: 
 5901: tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange(Sock, Send, Recv, InitMsg, Num) ->
 5902:     Start = ?SLIB:timestamp(),
 5903:     tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv, InitMsg, 
 5904:                                      Num, 0, 0, 0, Start).
 5905: 
 5906: tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, _Send, _Recv, _Msg,
 5907:                                  Num, Num, Sent, Received,
 5908:                                  Start) ->
 5909:     Stop = ?SLIB:timestamp(),
 5910:     Info = socket:info(Sock),
 5911:     case socket:close(Sock) of
 5912:         ok ->
 5913:             {Sent, Received, Info, Start, Stop};
 5914:         {error, Reason} ->
 5915:             exit({failed_closing, Reason})
 5916:     end;
 5917: tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv, Data, 
 5918:                                  Num, N, Sent, Received, Start) ->
 5919:     %% d("tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange_loop(~w,~w) try send ~w", [Num,N,size(Data)]),
 5920:     case tpp_tcp_send_req(Sock, Send, Data) of
 5921:         {ok, SendSz} ->
 5922:             %% d("tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange_loop(~w,~w) sent - "
 5923:             %%   "now try recv", [Num,N]),
 5924:             case tpp_tcp_recv_rep(Sock, Recv) of
 5925:                 {ok, NewData, RecvSz} ->
 5926:                     tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv,
 5927:                                                      NewData, Num, N+1,
 5928:                                                      Sent+SendSz, 
 5929:                                                      Received+RecvSz, 
 5930:                                                      Start);
 5931:                 {error, RReason} ->
 5932:                     ?SEV_EPRINT("recv (~w of ~w): ~p: "
 5933:                                 "~n   ~p", [N, Num, RReason, ?MQ()]),
 5934:                     exit({recv, RReason, N})
 5935:             end;
 5936:         {error, SReason} ->
 5937:             ?SEV_EPRINT("send (~w of ~w): ~p"
 5938:                         "~n   ~p", [N, Num, SReason, ?MQ()]),
 5939:             case SReason of
 5940:                 emsgsize ->
 5941:                     exit({send, SReason, N, byte_size(Data)});
 5942:                 _ ->
 5943:                     exit({send, SReason, N})
 5944:             end
 5945:     end.
 5946: 
 5947: tpp_tcp_client_sock_open(Domain, Proto, BufInit) ->
 5948:     case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
 5949:         {ok, Sock} ->
 5950:             ok = BufInit(Sock),
 5951:             Sock;
 5952:         {error, Reason} ->
 5953:             exit({open_failed, Reason})
 5954:     end.
 5955: 
 5956: tpp_tcp_client_sock_bind(Sock, Domain) ->
 5957:     LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 5958:     case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
 5959:         ok ->
 5960:             case socket:sockname(Sock) of
 5961:                 {ok, #{family := local, path := Path}} ->
 5962:                     Path;
 5963:                 {ok, _} ->
 5964:                     undefined;
 5965:                 {error, Reason1} ->
 5966:                     exit({sockname, Reason1})
 5967:             end;
 5968:         {error, Reason2} ->
 5969:             exit({bind, Reason2})
 5970:     end.
 5971: 
 5972: tpp_tcp_client_sock_connect(Sock, ServerSA) ->
 5973:     case socket:connect(Sock, ServerSA) of
 5974:         ok ->
 5975:             ok;
 5976:         {error, Reason} ->
 5977:             exit({connect, Reason})
 5978:     end.
 5979: 
 5980: tpp_tcp_client_sock_close(Sock, Path) ->
 5981:     case socket:close(Sock) of
 5982:         ok ->
 5983:             unlink_path(Path),
 5984:             ok;
 5985:         {error, closed} ->
 5986:             ok;
 5987:         {error, Reason} ->
 5988:             ?SEV_EPRINT("failed closing: "
 5989:                         "~n   Reason: ~p", [Reason]),
 5990:             unlink_path(Path),
 5991:             {error, {close, Reason}}
 5992:     end.
 5993: 
 5994:     
 5995:     
 5996: -define(TPP_REQUEST, 1).
 5997: -define(TPP_REPLY,   2).
 5998: 
 5999: tpp_tcp_recv_req(Sock, Recv) ->
 6000:     tpp_tcp_recv(Sock, Recv, ?TPP_REQUEST).
 6001: 
 6002: tpp_tcp_recv_rep(Sock, Recv) ->
 6003:     tpp_tcp_recv(Sock, Recv, ?TPP_REPLY).
 6004: 
 6005: tpp_tcp_recv(Sock, Recv, Tag) ->
 6006:     case Recv(Sock, 0) of
 6007:         {ok, <<Tag:32/integer, Sz:32/integer, Data/binary>> = Msg} 
 6008:           when (Sz =:= size(Data)) ->
 6009:             %% We got it all
 6010:             {ok, Data, size(Msg)};
 6011:         {ok, <<Tag:32/integer, Sz:32/integer, Data/binary>> = Msg} ->
 6012:             Remains = Sz - size(Data),
 6013:             tpp_tcp_recv(Sock, Recv, Tag, Remains, size(Msg), [Data]);
 6014:         {ok, <<Tag:32/integer, _/binary>>} ->
 6015:             {error, {invalid_msg_tag, Tag}};
 6016:         {error, _R} = ERROR ->
 6017:             ERROR
 6018:     end.
 6019: 
 6020: tpp_tcp_recv(Sock, Recv, Tag, Remaining, AccSz, Acc) ->
 6021:     case Recv(Sock, Remaining) of
 6022:         {ok, Data} when (Remaining =:= size(Data)) ->
 6023:             %% We got the rest
 6024:             TotSz = AccSz + size(Data),
 6025:             {ok, erlang:iolist_to_binary(lists:reverse([Data | Acc])), TotSz};
 6026:         {ok, Data} when (Remaining > size(Data)) ->
 6027:             tpp_tcp_recv(Sock, Recv, Tag, 
 6028:                          Remaining - size(Data), AccSz + size(Data),     
 6029:                          [Data | Acc]);
 6030:         {error, _R} = ERROR ->
 6031:             ERROR
 6032:     end.
 6033:                                                          
 6034:             
 6035: tpp_tcp_send_req(Sock, Send, Data) ->
 6036:     tpp_tcp_send(Sock, Send, ?TPP_REQUEST, Data).
 6037: 
 6038: tpp_tcp_send_rep(Sock, Send, Data) ->
 6039:     tpp_tcp_send(Sock, Send, ?TPP_REPLY, Data).
 6040: 
 6041: tpp_tcp_send(Sock, Send, Tag, Data) ->
 6042:     DataSz = size(Data),
 6043:     Msg    = <<Tag:32/integer, DataSz:32/integer, Data/binary>>,
 6044:     tpp_tcp_send_msg(Sock, Send, Msg, 0).
 6045: 
 6046: tpp_tcp_send_msg(Sock, Send, Msg, AccSz) when is_binary(Msg) ->
 6047:     case Send(Sock, Msg) of
 6048:         ok ->
 6049:             {ok, AccSz+size(Msg)};
 6050:         {ok, Rest} -> % This is an IOVec
 6051:             RestBin = list_to_binary(Rest),
 6052:             tpp_tcp_send_msg(Sock, Send, RestBin, AccSz+(size(Msg)-size(RestBin)));
 6053:         {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6054:             ERROR
 6055:     end.
 6056:     
 6057: 
 6058: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6059: 
 6060: %% Ping-Pong for UDP
 6061: 
 6062: traffic_ping_pong_sendto_and_recvfrom_udp(InitState) ->
 6063:     Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) ->
 6064:                    socket:sendto(Sock, Data, Dest)
 6065:            end,
 6066:     Recv = fun(Sock, Sz)         ->
 6067:                    socket:recvfrom(Sock, Sz)
 6068:            end,
 6069:     InitState2 = InitState#{send => Send, % Send function
 6070:                             recv => Recv  % Receive function
 6071:                            },
 6072:     traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_udp(InitState2).
 6073: 
 6074: traffic_ping_pong_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp(InitState) ->
 6075:     Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) when is_binary(Data) ->
 6076:                    Msg = #{addr => Dest, iov => [Data]},
 6077:                    socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg);
 6078:               (Sock, Data, Dest) when is_list(Data) -> %% We assume iovec...
 6079:                    Msg = #{addr => Dest, iov => Data},
 6080:                    socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 6081:            end,
 6082:     Recv = fun(Sock, Sz)   ->
 6083:                    case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Sz, 0) of
 6084:                        {ok, #{addr  := Source,
 6085:                               iov   := [Data]}} ->
 6086:                            {ok, {Source, Data}};
 6087:                        {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6088:                            ERROR
 6089:                    end
 6090:            end,
 6091:     InitState2 = InitState#{send => Send, % Send function
 6092:                             recv => Recv  % Receive function
 6093:                            },
 6094:     traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_udp(InitState2).
 6095: 
 6096: 
 6097: traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_udp(#{msg := Msg} = InitState) ->
 6098:     Fun = fun(Sock) -> 
 6099:                   {ok, RcvSz} = socket:getopt(Sock, socket, rcvbuf),
 6100:                   if (RcvSz =< (8+size(Msg))) ->
 6101:                           i("adjust socket rcvbuf buffer size"),
 6102:                           ok = socket:setopt(Sock, socket, rcvbuf, 1024+size(Msg));
 6103:                      true ->
 6104:                           ok
 6105:                   end,
 6106:                   {ok, SndSz} = socket:getopt(Sock, socket, sndbuf),
 6107:                   if (SndSz =< (8+size(Msg))) ->
 6108:                           i("adjust socket sndbuf buffer size"),
 6109:                           ok = socket:setopt(Sock, socket, sndbuf, 1024+size(Msg));
 6110:                      true ->
 6111:                           ok
 6112:                   end,
 6113:                   {ok, OtpRcvBuf} = socket:getopt(Sock, otp, rcvbuf),
 6114:                   if
 6115:                       (OtpRcvBuf =< (8+size(Msg))) ->
 6116:                           i("adjust otp rcvbuf buffer size"),
 6117:                           ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, rcvbuf, 1024+size(Msg));
 6118:                       true ->
 6119:                           ok
 6120:                   end
 6121:           end,
 6122:     traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_udp2(InitState#{buf_init => Fun}).
 6123: 
 6124: traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_udp2(InitState) ->
 6125:     ServerSeq =
 6126:         [
 6127:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 6128:          #{desc => "await start",
 6129:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6130:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 6131:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 6132:                    end},
 6133:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 6134:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6135:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 6136:                            ok
 6137:                    end},
 6138: 
 6139:          %% *** Init part ***
 6140:          #{desc => "which local address",
 6141:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 6142:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 6143:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
 6144:                    end},
 6145:          #{desc => "create socket",
 6146:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, proto := Proto} = State) ->
 6147:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, Proto) of
 6148:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 6149:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 6150:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6151:                                    ERROR
 6152:                            end
 6153:                    end},
 6154:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 6155:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 6156:                          sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
 6157:                            case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
 6158:                                ok ->
 6159:                                    ok;
 6160:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6161:                                    ERROR
 6162:                            end;
 6163:                       (#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
 6164:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 6165:                                ok ->
 6166:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
 6167:                                    {ok, State#{port => Port}};
 6168:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6169:                                    ERROR
 6170:                            end
 6171:                    end},
 6172:          #{desc => "maybe init buffers",
 6173:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, buf_init := BufInit} = _State) ->
 6174:                            BufInit(Sock)
 6175:                    end},
 6176:          #{desc => "create handler",
 6177:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6178:                            Handler = tpp_udp_server_handler_create(),
 6179:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("handler created: ~p", [Handler]),
 6180:                            {ok, State#{handler => Handler}}
 6181:                    end},
 6182:          #{desc => "monitor handler",
 6183:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler} = _State) ->
 6184:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Handler),
 6185:                            ok
 6186:                    end},
 6187:          #{desc => "start handler",
 6188:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler,
 6189:                          sock    := Sock,
 6190:                          send    := Send,
 6191:                          recv    := Recv} = _State) ->
 6192:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Handler, {Sock, Send, Recv}),
 6193:                            ok
 6194:                    end},
 6195:          #{desc => "await handler ready (init)",
 6196:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 6197:                          handler := Handler} = State) ->
 6198:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Handler, handler, init, 
 6199:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
 6200:                                ok ->
 6201:                                    {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)};
 6202:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6203:                                    ERROR
 6204:                            end
 6205:                    end},
 6206:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 6207:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 6208:                          tester := Tester, local_sa := LSA}) ->
 6209:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, LSA),
 6210:                            ok;
 6211:                       (#{tester := Tester, local_sa := LSA, port := Port}) ->
 6212:                            ServerSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 6213:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, ServerSA),
 6214:                            ok
 6215:                    end},
 6216: 
 6217:          %% The actual test
 6218:          #{desc => "await continue (recv)",
 6219:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 6220:                          handler := Handler} = _State) ->
 6221:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv, 
 6222:                                                [{handler, Handler}])
 6223:                    end},
 6224:          #{desc => "order handler to recv",
 6225:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler,
 6226:                          sock    := _Sock} = _State) ->
 6227:                            %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
 6228:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Handler, recv),
 6229:                            ok
 6230:                    end},
 6231:          #{desc => "await continue (close)",
 6232:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 6233:                          handler := Handler} = _State) ->
 6234:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close, 
 6235:                                                [{handler, Handler}])
 6236:                    end},
 6237: 
 6238:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 6239: 
 6240:          #{desc => "close socket",
 6241:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 6242:                            %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
 6243:                            case socket:close(Sock) of
 6244:                                ok ->
 6245:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)};
 6246:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6247:                                    ERROR
 6248:                            end
 6249:                    end},
 6250:          #{desc => "(maybe) unlink socket",
 6251:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 6252:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 6253:                            unlink_path(Path,
 6254:                                        fun() ->
 6255:                                                {ok, maps:remove(local_sa, State)}
 6256:                                        end,
 6257:                                        fun() ->
 6258:                                                ok
 6259:                                        end);
 6260:                       (_) ->
 6261:                            ok
 6262:                    end},
 6263:          #{desc => "announce ready (close)",
 6264:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6265:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, close),
 6266:                            ok
 6267:                    end},
 6268:          #{desc => "await handler ready (recv)",
 6269:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
 6270:                          handler := Handler} = State) ->
 6271:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Handler, handler, recv, 
 6272:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
 6273:                                {ok, Result} ->
 6274:                                    %% ?SEV_IPRINT("Result: ~p", [Result]),
 6275:                                    {ok, State#{result => Result}};
 6276:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6277:                                    ERROR
 6278:                            end
 6279:                    end},
 6280:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv)",
 6281:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, 
 6282:                          result := Result} = State) ->
 6283:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv, Result),
 6284:                            {ok, maps:remove(result, State)}
 6285:                    end},
 6286: 
 6287:          %% Termination
 6288:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 6289:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 6290:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 6291:                                ok ->
 6292:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 6293:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6294:                                    ERROR
 6295:                            end
 6296:                    end},
 6297:          #{desc => "stop handler",
 6298:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler}) ->
 6299:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Handler),
 6300:                            ok
 6301:                    end},
 6302:          #{desc => "await handler termination",
 6303:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler} = State) ->
 6304:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Handler),
 6305:                            State1 = maps:remove(handler, State),
 6306:                            {ok, State1}
 6307:                    end},
 6308: 
 6309:          %% *** We are done ***
 6310:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 6311:         ],
 6312: 
 6313:     ClientSeq =
 6314:         [
 6315:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 6316:          #{desc => "await start",
 6317:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6318:                            {Tester, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 6319:                            {ok, State#{tester    => Tester, 
 6320:                                        server_sa => ServerSA}}
 6321:                    end},
 6322:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 6323:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6324:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 6325:                            ok
 6326:                    end},
 6327: 
 6328:          %% *** Init part ***
 6329:          #{desc => "create node",
 6330:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6331:                            {Peer, Node} = start_node("client"),
 6332:                            {ok, State#{peer => Peer, node => Node}}
 6333:                    end},
 6334:          #{desc => "monitor client node",
 6335:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = _State) ->
 6336:                            true = erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
 6337:                            ok
 6338:                    end},
 6339:          #{desc => "create (remote) handler",
 6340:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = State) ->
 6341:                            Pid = tpp_udp_client_handler_create(Node),
 6342:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("handler created: ~p", [Pid]),
 6343:                            {ok, State#{handler => Pid}}
 6344:                    end},
 6345:          #{desc => "monitor remote handler",
 6346:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Pid}) ->
